src:
FOTO: Črno jutro: v hudi nesreči umrl 21-letnik
Trčili sta osebno in tovorno vozilo.
07 Nov 2019, 07:59 by A. L.



Posledice smrtne nesreče. FOTO: Marko Feist



Posledice smrtne nesreče. FOTO: Marko Feist


KOZINA – Glavna cesta Kozina–Starod je zaprta za ves promet zaradi prometne nesreče pri Malih Ločah, poroča prometnoinformacijski center.Pri PU Koper so potrdili, da gre za prometno nesrečo s smrtnim izidom.


Posledice smrtne nesreče. FOTO: Marko Feist

»Ob 7.16 smo bili obveščeni o hujši prometni nesreči pri Podgradu proti Kozini. Po prvih podatkih je konec naselja Obrov v smeri Podgrada voznik osebnega avtomobila zaradi neprilagojene hitrosti izgubil nadzor nad vozilom in v ovinku zapeljal na nasprotnosmerno vozišče, kjer je trčil v tovorno vozilo. Voznik (43) tovornjaka iz okolice Pivke kljub umikanju ni mogel preprečiti trčenja,« pišejo v policijskem poročilu.Na kraju je umrl 21-letni voznik osebnega avtomobila, sicer domačin. 
Več preberite v petkovi izdaji Slovenskih novic.
text:
PHOTO: Black Morning: 21-year-old killed in a serious accident
A car and a truck collided.
07 Nov 2019, 07:59 by A.L.



The aftermath of a fatal accident. PHOTO: Marko Feist



The aftermath of a fatal accident. PHOTO: Marko Feist


KOZINA - The Kozina-Starod main road is closed to all traffic because of a car accident in Mali Loci, the Traffic Information Center reports. The Police Administration of Koper confirmed that it was a fatal traffic accident.


The aftermath of a fatal accident. PHOTO: Marko Feist

“At 7.16 we were informed about a serious traffic accident near Podgrad against Kozina. According to the first information, the driver of the passenger car lost control of the vehicle due to improper speed at the end of the settlement Obrov in the direction of Podgrad, and in a bend he drove to the opposite road, where he collided with the truck. The driver (43) of the truck from the Pivka area could not prevent the collision despite the retreat, "the police report said. A 21-year-old passenger of the car, who was a local, died at the scene.
Read more in Friday's edition of Slovenske novice.
